## Scene.onDispose() method

Disposes the scene and its owned resources.

Disposes: - Environment - Root node (and, by extension, its hierarchy) - Main camera reference wrapper

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected onDispose(): void;
```
**Returns:**

void
